description.narrative: Output 6.4 High quality child focused knowledge is generated, analyzed, and disseminated for evidence based programming, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Evaluation, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 6: Government and other partners at central and governorate level are undertaking equity focused, and evidence informed planning, monitoring.

participating-org.narrative: MINISTRY OF PLANNING AND INTERNATIO COOPERATION

description.narrative: Despite the current Covid-19 impacts on data collection activities and the continued restrictions and delays by the authorities in Yemen, significant efforts were made in evidence generation by completing a number of studies and assessments/surveys. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:16/01/2022
